text:
MeetMindful | Denver, CO | Software Engineer | Onsite | https://www.meetmindful.com/

MeetMindful is the market leader in online dating for singles interested in healthy living, wellness, and personal development. We're on a mission to empower people to make meaningful connections every day. We are a well-funded, Techstars alumni startup with an excellent track record of growth that values lean methodologies and a supportive team culture.

Weâ€™re looking for passionates, driven and modest full stack senior software engineers to join our team in Downtown Denver.

If you are a proven software developer with a passion for startups, machine learning, mobile development and an affinity for personal development and mindfulness, we want to connect with you.

Please email me at ben+hn@meetmindful.com if you are interested in the position.
